DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether screening for atrial fibrillation by intermittent ECG recording and initiation of anticoagulation treatment among high risk individuals is cost-effective and can lower the incidence of stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Systematic ECG Screening for Atrial Fibrillation Among 75 Year Old Subjects in the Region of Stockholm and Halland, Sweden
DOC.criteria: Men and women 7576 years of age living in the region of Stockholm or Halland Not fulfilling the inclusion criteria
